3:T1716,var Component=(()=>{var u=Object.create;var a=Object.defineProperty;var p=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor;var m=Object.getOwnPropertyNames;var f=Object.getPrototypeOf,g=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty;var b=(i,e)=>()=>(e||i((e={exports:{}}).exports,e),e.exports),v=(i,e)=>{for(var o in e)a(i,o,{get:e[o],enumerable:!0})},s=(i,e,o,r)=>{if(e&&typeof e=="object"||typeof e=="function")for(let t of m(e))!g.call(i,t)&&t!==o&&a(i,t,{get:()=>e[t],enumerable:!(r=p(e,t))||r.enumerable});return i};var w=(i,e,o)=>(o=i!=null?u(f(i)):{},s(e||!i||!i.__esModule?a(o,"default",{value:i,enumerable:!0}):o,i)),y=i=>s(a({},"__esModule",{value:!0}),i);var d=b((N,l)=>{l.exports=_jsx_runtime});var _={};v(_,{default:()=>k,frontmatter:()=>x});var n=w(d()),x={title:"Radiobutton",summary:"A radio button allows users to select one option from a predefined set of mutually exclusive choices.",date:new Date(17127072e5),global_id:"radiobutton",status:"work in progress",tags:"form",node:"3013-6016"};function c(i){let e=Object.assign({h2:"h2",a:"a",p:"p",ul:"ul",li:"li",strong:"strong",h3:"h3"},i.components),{Grid:o,Figma:r}=e;return r||h("Figma",!0),o||h("Grid",!0),(0,n.jsxs)(n.Fragment,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"overview",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#overview",children:"Overview"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"Radio buttons are used when users need to select one option from a set of mutually exclusive choices. They are commonly used in forms, surveys, and settings where users need to make a single selection from a list of options."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"The benefit of using radio buttons over select is that users may easily scan the available options and make a quick selection."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"variants",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#variants",children:"Variants"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Default:"})," used in most cases."]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Contained:"})," used only in combination with other contained form components."]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Contained extended:"})," The contained version but including Label support text."]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(o,{columns:3,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsx)(r,{node:"3024-9506",caption:"Default"}),(0,n.jsx)(r,{node:"3024-9508",caption:"Contained"}),(0,n.jsx)(r,{node:"3024-9510",caption:"Contained extended"})]}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"features",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#features",children:"Features"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(o,{columns:2,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.h3,{id:"label-support",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#label-support",children:"Label support"})}),(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:`May be used for both the group label, and for each individual radio button in the group.
Try to be consistent if using them on the individual buttons.`})]}),(0,n.jsx)(r,{node:"3171-10494",caption:"Label support for radio button"})]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(o,{columns:2,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.h3,{id:"error-handling",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#error-handling",children:"Error handling"})}),(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"If an error occur  s we mark the entire group of options with error. The error is described with an error message"})]}),(0,n.jsx)(r,{node:"3171-10601",caption:"Error handling for radio button"})]}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"behaviour",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#behaviour",children:"Behaviour"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Mutual Exclusivity:"})," Only one radio button within a group can be selected at a time."]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Defaults:"})," Aim for having one option pre-selected."]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"alignment",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#alignment",children:"Alignment"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"We can align the radio buttons both horizontal and vertical."}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Horizontal:"})," works best with very few options, this also saves space."]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(e.li,{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Vertical:"})," works best if there's more than two options, easier to scan and select."]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"dos-and-donts",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#dos-and-donts",children:"Do's and Don'ts"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(o,{columns:2,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Do:"})}),(0,n.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Use descriptive labels to clearly indicate the purpose of each radio button."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Keep the text as short as possible."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"There needs to be at least two options."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Try to sort the options in a logical order."}),`
`]})]}),(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:(0,n.jsx)(e.strong,{children:"Don't:"})}),(0,n.jsxs)(e.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Use radio buttons for non-mutually exclusive options; consider checkboxes instead."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Overload users with too many radio buttons in a question. If you have to present a lot of options, use a select."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Mix default and contained versions."}),`
`]})]})]})]})}function D(i={}){let{wrapper:e}=i.components||{};return e?(0,n.jsx)(e,Object.assign({},i,{children:(0,n.jsx)(c,i)})):c(i)}var k=D;function h(i,e){throw new Error("Expected "+(e?"component":"object")+" `"+i+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}return y(_);})();
